Uses of Package
oracle.pg.rdbms.index.jdbc

  • Packages that use oracle.pg.rdbms.index.jdbc 
    Package Description
    oracle.pg.rdbms.index.jdbc
    This package contains the logic specific to the management of a JDBC based Directory for Apache Lucene text index.
    oracle.pg.rdbms.index.jdbc.handler
    This package contains a set of modification to Compass EntryHandlers to support file level operations over the OracleJdbcDirectory directory under Lucene 4.5.
    oracle.pg.rdbms.index.jdbc.operators
    This package contains a set of modification to Compass operators to support Lucene index and output operations over Oracle Database.
  • Classes in oracle.pg.rdbms.index.jdbc used by oracle.pg.rdbms.index.jdbc 
    Class and Description
    JdbcDirectorySettings
    General directory level settings.
    JdbcFileEntrySettings
    An Oracle extension of Apache Compass JdbcFileEntrySettings to support file entry level settings over the Oracle JDBC directory.
    OracleIndexException
    A nestable checked Jdbc exception.
    OracleIndexFile 
    OracleJdbcDirectory 
  • Classes in oracle.pg.rdbms.index.jdbc used by oracle.pg.rdbms.index.jdbc.handler 
    Class and Description
    OracleJdbcDirectory 
  • Classes in oracle.pg.rdbms.index.jdbc used by oracle.pg.rdbms.index.jdbc.operators 
    Class and Description
    OracleJdbcDirectory
